item.title: 去年秋天，V-22 "鱼鹰 "飞机在日本发生致命坠机事故，造成八名军人丧生，美国军方已解除对该飞机的禁飞令，为这种倾斜旋翼机三个月来的首次复飞铺平了道路。
item.description:
The U.S. military has lifted its flight ban on V-22 Osprey aircraft after a deadly crash in Japan killed eight service members last fall, paving the way for the tilt rotorcraft to fly again for the first time in three months. https://t.co/pQsJ5sDSkm

— ABC News (@ABC) March 9, 2024

item.title: 美国经济上个月新增就业岗位27.5万个，超过了经济学家预期的约20万个。但数据显示，这与 1 月份约 35 万的新增就业人数相比仍有大幅下降。
item.description:
The U.S. economy added 275,000 jobs last month, blowing past economist expectations of about 200,000 jobs. Still, it was a substantial decline from the hiring of roughly 350,000 workers in January, data showed. https://t.co/B5jiUE6e5p

— ABC News (@ABC) March 9, 2024

item.title: 美国当局周四晚间表示，一名美国海军陆战队员的父亲于2021年美国撤出阿富汗时在阿富汗喀布尔机场遇害，他因扰乱国情咨文演讲而被美国国会警察逮捕。
item.description:
The father of a U.S. Marine who was killed at Afghanistan's Kabul airport in 2021 as America pulled out of the country was arrested by U.S. Capitol Police officers for disrupting the State of the Union address, authorities said Thursday night. https://t.co/pVeOcnHXlm

— ABC News (@ABC) March 9, 2024

item.title: 近年来，美国各地的社区都发生过使用改装成全自动武器的枪击事件，这是因为使用 3D 打印机制造或在网上订购的金属或塑料小部件急剧增加。
item.description:
Communities around the U.S. have seen shootings carried out with weapons converted to fully automatic in recent years, fueled by a staggering increase in small pieces of metal or plastic made with a 3D printer or ordered online. https://t.co/Wfux7koff5
